docs.lead_paragraph: The mood is exuberant at this year's North American International Auto Show. Automakers are flush with profits and the show gleams with performance cars, beefy trucks and exciting experiments, from plug-in hybrids to cars carved by a 3-D printer. Here are some key takeaways from the show, which opens to the public Saturday.

headline.main: Innovation, Optimism on Display at Detroit Auto Show
headline.print_headline: Innovation, Optimism on Display at Detroit Auto Show

docs.lead_paragraph: When you're standing around in Times Square trying to decide which Broadway show to see, don't be surprised if you get a visit from Tony Danza.

headline.main: Tony Danza Makes Broadway Very Personal
headline.print_headline: Tony Danza Makes Broadway Very Personal
